charges.charge_description: 21:846=CM.F CONSPIRACY TO MANUFACTURE Methamphetamine...During 2000 through 8/2000, at Bainville &; Culbertson, MT, defts conspired to manufacture methamphetamine(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Committed to custody of BOP for 90 mos on Count 1 and 90 mos on Count2 to run concurrent. Placed on S/T for 3 yrs on each cnt to run concurrent. Shall report to USPO w/in 72 hrs release. No F/S/L crime, no firearms, ammo, dang device, controlled subs t. Comply w/stand conds &; following spl conds: participate in mental health treatmnt program. Participate in subst abuse testg treatmnt. Abstain from alcohol; submit to searches. Pay restitution of $10992.40 to be paid jointly &; severally w/co-d efts @ $100 per month to be disbursed to US Drug Envforcement Administration. No fine. $100 Spl Assessmnt on each cnt for total $200 Spl Assmnt.

charges.charge_disposition: BOP 12 MONTHS. Recommend 500 hr drug trmnt pgrm, spr rel 3 yrs ea cnt concurrently, Spec assess $200 due immed. Restitution $10,992.40 jointly &; severally owed w/co-dfts Skabo and Turbiville. REVOCATION HEARING held 9/22/08; BOP 15 MONTHS w/no spr rel to follow
